columns.name: db_instance_identifier
columns.description: Contains a user-provided database identifier. This identifier is the unique key that identifies an instance.

columns.name: db_instance_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the instance.

columns.name: db_cluster_identifier
columns.description: Contains the name of the cluster that the instance is a member of if the instance is a member of a cluster.

columns.name: db_instance_status
columns.description: Specifies the current state of this database.

columns.name: db_instance_class
columns.description: Contains the name of the compute and memory capacity class of the instance.

columns.name: dbi_resource_id
columns.description: The Amazon Web Services Region-unique, immutable identifier for the instance.

columns.name: availability_zone
columns.description: Specifies the name of the availability zone the instance is located in.

columns.name: backup_retention_period
columns.description: Specifies the number of days for which automatic snapshots are retained.

columns.name: ca_certificate_identifier
columns.description: The identifier of the CA certificate for this DB instance.

columns.name: copy_tags_to_snapshot
columns.description: Specifies whether tags are copied from the DB instance to snapshots of the DB instance, or not.

columns.name: db_subnet_group_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the DB subnet group.

columns.name: db_subnet_group_description
columns.description: Provides the description of the DB subnet group.

columns.name: db_subnet_group_name
columns.description: The name of the DB subnet group.

columns.name: db_subnet_group_status
columns.description: Provides the status of the DB subnet group.

columns.name: endpoint_address
columns.description: Specifies the DNS address of the instance.

columns.name: endpoint_hosted_zone_id
columns.description: Specifies the ID that Amazon Route 53 assigns when you create a hosted zone.

columns.name: endpoint_port
columns.description: Specifies the port that the database engine is listening on.

columns.name: engine
columns.description: The name of the database engine to be used for this instance.

columns.name: engine_version
columns.description: Indicates the database engine version.

columns.name: instance_create_time
columns.description: Provides the date and time the instance was created.

columns.name: kms_key_id
columns.description: If StorageEncrypted is true, the KMS key identifier for the encrypted instance.

columns.name: latest_restorable_time
columns.description: Specifies the latest time to which a database can be restored with point-in-time restore.

columns.name: preferred_backup_window
columns.description: Specifies the daily time range during which automated backups are created.

columns.name: preferred_maintenance_window
columns.description: Specifies the weekly time range during which system maintenance can occur.

columns.name: promotion_tier
columns.description: A value that specifies the order in which an Amazon DocumentDB replica is promoted to the primary instance after a failure of the existing primary instance.

columns.name: publicly_accessible
columns.description: Specifies the accessibility options for the DB instance.

columns.name: storage_encrypted
columns.description: Specifies whether or not the instance is encrypted.

columns.name: vpc_id
columns.description: Provides the VpcId of the DB subnet group.

columns.name: enabled_cloudwatch_logs_exports
columns.description: A list of log types that this instance is configured to export to CloudWatch Logs.

columns.name: pending_modified_values
columns.description: Specifies that changes to the instance are pending.

columns.name: status_infos
columns.description: The status of a read replica.

columns.name: subnets
columns.description: A list of subnet elements.

columns.name: vpc_security_groups
columns.description: A list of VPC security group elements that the instance belongs to.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags attached to the Instance.
